page.title: 08ST MARY'S CHURCH
page.content:
The oldest parts of the church date back to the 12th century.The font is 15th century and is in the west side of the church.You can still see the remains of an old staircase which used to lead up to a tower, which fell down into the church.In 1859 new pews were put in,but now these too have been taken away.As well as church services there is a pre_school play group for small children.For the Yate festival(which is held in July) they hold an art exhibition and a musical concert.Later on in September there is a flower festival in the church.
Sarah Hopwood St Mary's
